action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joy T

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

We're looking to activate four location-specific pages on our website and would like your assistance.

1. Pages to Activate

Here are the draft pages we've formatted internally :

  • https://duracube.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=12757&action=edit
  • https://duracube.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=12782&action=edit
  • https://duracube.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=12611&action=edit
  • https://duracube.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=12775&action=edit

2. Figma References

Our external marketing team has prepared Figma mock-ups for the design.

Note: Text and images in these mock-ups are placeholders only.

  • Interactive prototype:https://www.figma.com/proto/CkFvvxy1xvDjyvG4wuBUpI/DuraCube-%7C-Location-Pages?page-id=0%3A1&node-id=6-1154&viewport=474%2C545%2C0.18&t=30jgK5TIZezuu561-1&scaling=scale-down&content-scaling=fixed&starting-point-node-id=6%3A115

  • Design file: https://www.figma.com/design/CkFvvxy1xvDjyvG4wuBUpI/DuraCube-%7C-Location-Pages?node-id=6-1154&t=KQx0JVCwX9fyEUFZ-0

3. Development Requirements

Please implement the following changes:

  1. URL Structure

    • Change to: /location/[location-name]/

  2. Hyperlink Styling
  3. Ensure hyperlinks use a distinct colour to make them clearly clickable.

  4. Project Image Interactivity

    • Currently, the 3 project images are in a single file and non-clickable.

    • Please make each image clickable, linking to its respective case study page.

  5. Colour Scheme

    • Apply the colour scheme from the Figma mock-ups.

  6. Content Adjustment

    • Ignore the "Let's talk about your project" and "Tailored finishes for your project" sections from the Figma pages. These have been consolidated into the main four pages already.

Please let me know if you need any additional resources, files, or clarification to move forward.

Thanks in advance for your help!
Kind Regards,
Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant
13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
1300 387 228
DuraCube
DuraCube
